Observed at: Campbell River Airport 6:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 35 mm over southern sections. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
